Package io.j4c.config

Class ConfigSources.MapBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.j4c.config.ConfigSources.MapBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Supplier<ConfigSource>
    Enclosing class:
    ConfigSources

    public static final class ConfigSources.MapBuilder
extends Object
implements Supplier<ConfigSource>
    Map ConfigSource Builder.

    It allows to configure following properties:

    • map - map of key-values to be loaded into tree-structure, where . (dot) in key separates config nodes;
    • validation mode - in strict mode a load fails (by default) in case of tree-structure failure (properties overlap), otherwise it is just logged;

    Properties overlapping causes a loading failing in strict mode. Otherwise it just logs warning.

    Following properties overlap: 

    
 app.port = 8080
 app      = app-name
    In lax mode it does not fail, just logs warning.

    A created Map ConfigSource works with immutable copy of original map. I.e. it does NOT support ConfigSource mutability.
